title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Claim a Free Benefactor Krieger Supercar
content:
Now through November 5, claim a free Benefactor Krieger (Super) and add this well-rounded hypercar to your vehicle collection. Just visit the Legendary Motorsport site, where the Krieger will be discounted from its regular GTA$2,875,000 price all the way down to GTA$0.

You can also claim a seasonal orange and black version version of the Krieger at the Luxury Autos Showroom with some cosmetic upgrades applied for a nominal GTA$ fee.
